quarks.runtime.jsoncontrol

Class JsonControlService

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.runtime.jsoncontrol.JsonControlService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlService

    public class JsonControlService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControlService
    Control service that accepts control instructions as JSON objects. Currently just supports operations with no arguments as a work in progress.

    • Method Detail

      • controlRequest

        public com.google.gson.JsonElement controlRequest(com.google.gson.JsonObject request)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Handle a JSON control request. The control action is executed directly using the calling thread.
        Returns:
        JSON response, JSON null if the request was not recognized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • registerControl

        public <T> java.lang.String registerControl(java.lang.String type,
                                            java.lang.String id,
                                            java.lang.String alias,
                                            java.lang.Class<T> controlInterface,
                                            T control)
        Register a control server MBean for an oplet.

        All control service MBeans must be valid according to Controls.isControlServiceMBean(Class).

        Specified by:
        registerControl in interface ControlService
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the control object.
        id - Unique identifier for the control object.
        alias - Alias for the control object. Expected to be unique within the context of type.
        controlInterface - Public interface for the control object.
        control - The control bean
        Returns:
        unique identifier that can be used to unregister an control mbean.
        See Also:
        Controls.isControlServiceMBean(Class)

      • unregister

        public void unregister(java.lang.String controlId)
        Unregister a control bean registered by ControlService.registerControl(String, String, String, Class, Object)
        Specified by:
        unregister in interface ControlService
